data.description: Flexible CMS written in pure Perl.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was projected as tool to develop Content Management
    Systems - it's a reason of namespace choice.

    This module assure easy way of creating flexible, objec-oriented
    WWW portals with CMS functionality. All elements
    (menu,banners,login,etc.) are plugins and can be easy added.

    In the module will be included protal based on it (with some
    plugins), which is the best example how to use it.

    At the moment there isn't any module, which can give WWW developers
    such functionality.
